description: Echoes of sandstone and sacred stone — a soundtrack for wandering Khajuraho's temple trails.

items.name: Kandariya Mahadeva Temple – For A Spiritual Retreat
items.entry_fee_text: Indian tourists are charged INR 10 to get into the temple.

items.name: Lakshmana Temple – Marvel At The Architecture
items.location_hint: Rajnagar Rd, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606
items.entry_fee_text: Indian tourists are charged with INR 10.

items.name: Light And Sound Show – Enjoy Narration Of The Temples
Manjeshwar Temple – Witness The Morning Aarti
items.location_hint: The temple is located 900 m from the bus stand of Khajuraho.

items.name: Javari Temple – Amidst Lush Greenery
items.entry_fee_text: You can visit the temple for free.

items.name: Chaturbhuj Temple – The Hidden Gem
items.location_hint: The temple is situated 2 km from the Khajuraho bus stand.
items.entry_fee_text: Indian tourists are charged with INR 10.

items.name: Vishvanatha Temple – A Sight To Withhold
items.location_hint: Rajnagar Rd, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606
items.entry_fee_text: You will be charged with INR 10 to enter the temple.

items.name: Jagadambi Temple – Adorned By Sculptures & Carvings
items.location_hint: The temple is located 1.6 km from the Khajuraho bus stand.
items.entry_fee_text: The temple can be visited without any charges.

items.name: Shantinatha Temple – Sacred Jain Site
items.location_hint: The temple is located at a distance of 1.3 km from the bus stand of Khajuraho.
items.entry_fee_text: the temple can be visited without any extra charge.

items.name: State Museum Of Tribal and Folk Art – Relish The Culture
items.location_hint: The Museum is located at a distance of 2 km from the Khajuraho group of temples.
items.entry_fee_text: The entry fee of the Museum is INR 10.

items.name: Duladeo Temple – Home To A Striking Shiva Lingam
items.description: Built in 1130, the Dulhadev temple is home to a striking shiva lingam and stunning sculptures of Apsaras. The temple also has a beautiful sculpture of Lord Shiva with his wife Parvati with other intricate details of the carvings that add to the beauty of the architecture of the temple.

items.name: Parsvnath Temple – Most Intriguing Style Of Architecture
Archaeological Museum Khajuraho – Home To Ancient Relics
items.description: Located near the Western group of temples in Khajuraho, it was originally known as the Jardine Museum. The museum houses over 2000 items and has relics from the 10th and 12th century temples of Hinduism and Jainism.
items.location_hint: Rajnagar Rd, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606

items.name: Raneh Falls – To Relax & Unwind
Beni Sagar Dam – Ideal Spot For Picknickers
items.description: Built over River Khuddar, this magnificent dam is located in close proximity to the main town of Khajuraho and it is one of the best places to visit near Delhi in winters 2021-22. You can indulge in several recreational activities or plan a day outing to this dam. This is an ideal spot for picnickers and people who would love to unwind and relax in the serene and calm atmosphere of this dam surrounded by a picturesque setting.

items.name: Dhubela Museum – Marvel At The Intricate Paintings
items.description: Famously known as the Maharaja Chhatrasal Museum, the Dhubela Museum lies at a distance of 62 km from Khajuroaho and one of the most interesting places to visit in Khajuraho. It is surrounded by picturesque views on the banks of Dhubela lake. The museum displays an extensive collection of sculptures and intricate paintings that are spread across eight galleries.

items.name: Jain Museum – Find Mythical Creatures
items.description: Jain museum is an interesting place to visit that lies inside the beautiful complex of Jain temples. The museum houses stunning statues and sculptures of Jain tirthankaras and yakshis. You'll find mythical creatures of Makara Torana at the entrance gate of the museum.
items.location_hint: Eastern Group of Temples, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606

items.name: Nandi Temple – A World Heritage Site In Khajuraho
items.description: The famous Nandi temple is one of the most prime attractions of Khajuraho, they are part of the Khajuraho Group of Monuments which is a World Heritage Site in Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh. The temple is dedicated to Nandi – the bull which is the mount of Lord Shiva.

items.name: Chausath Yogini Temple – Ruins To Explore
items.description: If you want to witness one of the oldest temples in Khajuraho then you must pay a visit to Chausath Yogini Temple. Established in the late 9th century, this monument is visited for its national importance. While exploring this place, you will realize that there is no sculpture inside it and now it is left as a ruin. If you are a history buff and like to explore less-explored places then this is the perfect spot for you.

items.name: Adinath Temple – See The Indo-Aryan Architecture
items.description: Dedicated to Tirthankar, the Jain God, this temple is considered as one of the most exquisite temples not only in Khajuraho but also in the whole of Madhya Pradesh. It is a perfect place to visit for curious and artist people as the place is aesthetically appealing. You can also find several images and sculptures of Yakshis while exploring the nooks & corners of this temple.
items.location_hint: Eastern Group of Temples, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606

items.name: Varaha Temple – Dedicated To Lord Vishnu
items.description: Another one on the list of the best places to visit in Khajuraho is Varaha Temple that enshrines an idol of an incarnation of Lord Vishnu. The sculpture is made with sandstone and has many carvings all over the body which makes it a unique place to visit in Madhya Pradesh. The amazing fact about this sculpture is that it looks like Goddess Saraswati if seen from one angle.

items.name: Vaman Temple – Study The Intricate Carvings
items.description: There is no dearth of historical and religious places in Khajuraho, so the next one on the list is Vaman Temple. The temple is dedicated to the fifth incarnation of Lord Vishnu, Vaman. The walls of the shrine are adorned with the erotic carvings of women and celestial bodies in several positions. This place receives a heavy footfall of tourists throughout the year.
items.location_hint: Eastern Group of Temples, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606

items.name: Chitragupta Temple – The Temple Of Sun God
items.description: Dating back to the 11th century, Chitragupta Temple is dedicated to the Sun God, Surya. You can see a beautiful carving of deities riding a chariot with seven horses. Moreover, the exterior walls are full of erotic carvings of couples as well as gods. It is a must-visit place in Khajuraho and Madhya Pradesh which is why you can witness several tourists exploring the place.
items.location_hint: Rajnagar Rd, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606

items.name: Ghantai Temple – Visited For Its Unique Architecture
items.description: Now left as ruins, Ghantai Temple lies on the outskirts of the Jain Groups of Temples in Khajuraho. It is one of the oldest temples here as its origin can be traced back to 995 CE. The temple got its name due to the huge carvings of chain and bell on the pillars. As the temple is famous for its architectural style, it is visited by several curious souls.
items.location_hint: Eastern Group of Temples, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606

items.name: Kalinjar Fort – Ideal For History Buffs
items.description: It is one of the eight most famous forts that were built by the Chandela rulers. Settled at a height of 244 meters in the Vindhya Ranges, the whole fort was under the Chandela kings. It is one of the best places to visit in Khajuraho for history buffs and artists so make sure that you include it in your itinerary and visit it this year.
